name: Midnight-Chase
description:
Escape with the loot from police. Use the trailer for destroying police cars or just drive away as fast as you can. Be careful to not get caught or destroyed. But remember, if you want to achieve higher score, running away won't be enough. 

TUTORIAL/CONTROLS

  • Movement
    • Acceleration – W/Arrow Up
    • Brakes/Reverse – S/Arrow Down
    • Steering – A, D/Arrow Left, Arrow Right
  • UI 
    • ESC – pauses the game (unfortunately it also makes the game smaller in WebGL)
    • Health bar – the yellow bar in top left corner
    • Busted – black/red bar with the car
    • Points – gained by destroying police cars

TEAM

Jiří Filek – Programming, Level Design, Technical Art
Martina Fusková – UI, Level Design, Sound Design, Game Design
Eve – Art Design, Level Design (almost implemented 😭)
